name: Kasoniphobia
description:
This is game for Senscape's Adventurous Game Jam 2021. I was trying it out solo and it is my first game learning experience so a lot of rough edges and sadly it lacks sound and music in there since I ran out of time. After such a learning experience I hope to make a game with better features and more content later on. 

WASD keys to move and Space bar to interact with objects. I hope to make a mouse-mode for the adventure game fans later.

The game is a semi-silent game that tries to be more exploration than adventure games though in my game jam I focused on a puzzle-centered segment. I'm hoping in a more expanded game, the story can be told better by the elements in the game.
